text: - Hi, I'm Debashish Mishra,

Associate Vice President Head
of Cloud and DevOps platform
with Broadridge India.
Broadridge is a global FinTech leader
with more than six billion in revenue.
We provide the critical infrastructure

that powers investing,
corporate governance

and communications to enable
better financial lives.

Our organization encountered
cloud cost of challenges
driven by a number of factors,
inefficient resource declaration,

lack of cloud spend visibility
and business priority.

Our cloud expenses were
consuming a growing potion
of our IT budget, making it difficult
to invest in other strategic initiative.

Engaging with our time
from AWS Enterprise Support

and leveraging their
expertise was instrumental

in identifying and implementing
cost optimizing strategy.
By right sizing resource implementing,
we can pause migrating to GP3 Storage
and leveraging spot instances,

we reduced our monthly bill,
the cloud expenses by 20%.
Collaboration with AWS Enterprise Support

empowered our organization
to maximize performance

and reduce cost, which also
enabled our organization
to reinvest in strategic initiatives
and innovation projects.
Throughout our cost optimization journey,

we have learned valuable lessons
that we would like to share
with other organization.
Few of them, start early.
Seek help from AWS Enterprise Support.

Use right combination of
tools, and share the knowledge
and best practices across the community.
Thank you.
(funky music)
